attributes.action: Goverment to make it law all assessments on behalf of the DWP must be recorded
attributes.background: Due to the amount of medical assessments being declined and then overturned by the tribunal that are being carried out on behalf of the DWP,If they are all recorded there can be no mistakes made as to what was said by the claiment or dr/nurse and in the long run this will save tax payers money

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. We aren't sure what kind of record you would like there to be - a full written record (a transcript of everything said), or an audio or video record of what happens.

You could start a petition which outlines what specific action you would like the Government and Parliament to take.
